context: I made an insensitive joke at your expense
letter:
Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I want to take a moment to sincerely apologize for the insensitive joke I made the other day. In hindsight, I realize that my words could have been hurtful, and I deeply regret any discomfort I may have caused you.

Our friendship means a great deal to me, and I understand that jokes can sometimes cross a line, especially when they touch on sensitive topics. I respect you and value the trust we share, and I am truly sorry for not being more mindful of your feelings in that moment.

Please know that it was never my intention to upset you. I will be more conscious of my words in the future, and I appreciate your understanding as I work to improve myself.

Thank you for your patience and for being such a wonderful friend. I hope we can move past this and continue to share positive moments together.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
